name: CaptainShip
description:
Please Note: This app is free, cool gameplay and optimized user interaction.

The objective of this game is simple: Touch and slide a ship/boat to move it. The goal is to get the GREEN ship out of the way. Horizontal ships/boats can only move horizontally. Vertical ships/boats can only move vertically.

We human clans spend one fourth of our lives ineffectually migrating to undesirable destinations (i.e. stuck in traffic jam during rush hour). Make the most of this time with this amazing game. Designed to develop sequential thinking for impulsive brains, the game offers more than 10,000 puzzles for you to clash. However, the ships and boats obstruct the path which makes the puzzle harder.

Game Features :-

* 4 difficulty levels (Easy to Expert)
* 10000+ puzzles
* Hint and undo system
* Awesome gameplay
* Clean UI
* Nice music and sound effects
* Cool animations
* Keep track of all the puzzles and much much more....

Challenge your friends and compare your moves in this amazing ship navigation game and be the Captain. Have fun....
